recipe.title: Orange Vegetables Tagine with Peaches

inspiration.text: Orange Vegetables Tagine with Peaches by One Green Planet

recipe.ingredients: 3 tbsp olive oil 1 large, or 2 small onions 2 garlic cloves, finely chopped 1 inch piece of ginger, finely grated 400g can chickpeas ½ cup golden raisins 1 tsp harissa 450g butternut squash (~half a squash) 2 yams, cut into bite size pieces 2 potatoes, cut into bite size pieces 4 carrots, cut into rounds 410g can tinned peaches, sliced 2 cups vegetable broth 1 heaping tbsp ground cumin 1 tsp paprika ½ tsp cinnamon ½ tsp chili powder Zest of 1 lemon Chopped parsley and lemon wedges, for serving We served with cous cous

method.step: In a heavy bottom pan, cook onion in oil until it turns translucent, ~10 min. Add garlic and ginger and saute for an additional 3 min, until they are beginning to colour. Add the chickpeas, raisins, and harissa, and cook together for an additional 5 min
Add rest of ingredients and enough water to submerge them. Cover with a lid
Cook at 180oC for 45 minutes (vegetables should be fully cooked and tender, but still firm and holding their shape). Remove lid and cook for an additional 15 min.
Prepare cous cous using vegetable broth. Stir in pickled raisins
Top with chopped parsley. Serve with cous cous, with a squeeze of lemon on each plate.
